sn40.1:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahamoggallano savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn40.1:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhikkhu amantesi:
sn40.1:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosum.
sn40.1:2.1: “Idha mayham, avuso, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn40.1:2.5: ‘idha bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn40.1:2.7: So khvaham, avuso, vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn40.1:2.8: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato kamasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
sn40.1:3.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn40.1:3.3: Ma, brahmana, pathamam jhanam pamado, pathame jhane cittam santhapehi, pathame jhane cittam ekodim karohi, pathame jhane cittam samadaha’ti.
sn40.1:3.4: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja vihasim.
sn40.1:3.5: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn40.1:3.6: ‘sattharanuggahito savako mahabhinnatam patto’ti, mamam tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
